title.rendered: Eldorado Outdoor Featured in Design NJ and New York Spaces

content.rendered:
You can’t approach summer and not consider your outdoor space. Eldorado Outdoor was featured in the May 2012 issue of Design NJ for making the very real and intimidating prospect of creating luxury outdoor entertainment enclaves less stressful and at a fraction of the cost.

Editors of New York Spaces recently featured two Eldorado Outdoor signature designs, the Metropolitan Configuration and the CoastalRanch Kitchen, in addition to highlighting Eldorado Stone and Brick.
